document.full_text: suspected militants detonated a roadside bomb in the pakistani city of karachi on thursday, killing four members of the navy, the third attack on the navy in less than a week.
document.title: bomb hits pakistan navy bus, third this week
lines_and_colors: suspected militants detonated a roadside bomb in the pakistani city of karachi on thursday, killing four members of the navy, the third attack on the navy in less than a week.
